sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Card, CardContent, Typography, Grid, Avatar } from '@mui/material';

const TestimonialGrid = () => {
  return (
    <Box sx={{ p: 4, bgcolor: '#F3F4F6', minHeight: '100vh' }}>
      <Grid container spacing={3} maxWidth="1100px" margin="0 auto">
        {/* Top row */}
        <Grid item xs={12} md={8}>
          <Card sx={{ 
            bgcolor: 'rgb(129, 82, 210)', 
            color: 'white', 
            borderRadius: 3, 
            height: '100%',
            position: 'relative',
            overflow: 'visible'
          }}>
            <Box sx={{ 
              position: 'absolute', 
              top: 0, 
              right: 30, 
              opacity: 0.7, 
              fontSize: '120px', 
              color: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.4)',
              transform: 'translateY(-30%)'
            }}>
              " "
            </Box>
            <CardContent sx={{ position: 'relative', zIndex: 1, p: 4 }}>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', mb: 2 }}>
                <Avatar sx={{ mr: 2 }} src="/api/placeholder/40/40" alt="Daniel Clifford" />
                <Box>
                  <Typography variant="subtitle1" fontWeight="bold">
                    Daniel Clifford
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="body2">Verified Graduate</Typography>
                </Box>
              </Box>
              <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight="bold" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
                I received a job offer mid-course, and the subjects I learned were current, if not more so, in the company I joined. I honestly feel I got every penny's worth.
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ opacity: 0.7 }}>
                " I was an EMT for many years before I joined the bootcamp. I've been looking to make a transition and have heard some people who had an amazing experience here. I signed up for the free intro course and found it incredibly fun! I enrolled shortly thereafter. The next 12 weeks was the best - and most grueling - time of my life. Since completing the course, I've successfully switched careers, working as a Software Engineer at a VR startup. "
              </Typography>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Grid>

        <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
          <Card sx={{ 
            bgcolor: 'rgb(94, 106, 127)', 
            color: 'white', 
            borderRadius: 3, 
            height: '100%' 
          }}>
            <CardContent sx={{ p: 4 }}>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', mb: 2 }}>
                <Avatar sx={{ mr: 2 }} src="/api/placeholder/40/40" alt="Jonathan Walters" />
                <Box>
                  <Typography variant="subtitle1" fontWeight="bold">
                    Jonathan Walters
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="body2">Verified Graduate</Typography>
                </Box>
              </Box>
              <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight="bold" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
                The team was very supportive and kept me motivated
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ opacity: 0.7 }}>
                " I started as a total newbie with virtually no coding skills. I now work as a mobile engineer for a big company. This was one of the best investments I've made in myself. "
              </Typography>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Grid>

        {/* Middle row */}
        <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
          <Card sx={{ 
            bgcolor: 'white', 
            color: 'black', 
            borderRadius: 3, 
            height: '100%' 
          }}>
            <CardContent sx={{ p: 4 }}>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', mb: 2 }}>
                <Avatar sx={{ mr: 2 }} src="/api/placeholder/40/40" alt="Jeanette Harmon" />
                <Box>
                  <Typography variant="subtitle1" fontWeight="bold">
                    Jeanette Harmon
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="body2">Verified Graduate</Typography>
                </Box>
              </Box>
              <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight="bold" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
                An overall wonderful and rewarding experience
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                " Thank you for the wonderful experience! I now have a job I really enjoy, and make a good living while doing something I love. "
              </Typography>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Grid>

        <Grid item xs={12} md={8}>
          <Card sx={{ 
            bgcolor: 'rgb(8, 3, 42)', 
            color: 'white', 
            borderRadius: 3, 
            height: '100%' 
          }}>
            <CardContent sx={{ p: 4 }}>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', mb: 2 }}>
                <Avatar sx={{ mr: 2 }} src="/api/placeholder/40/40" alt="Patrick Abrams" />
                <Box>
                  <Typography variant="subtitle1" fontWeight="bold">
                    Patrick Abrams
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="body2">Verified Graduate</Typography>
                </Box>
              </Box>
              <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight="bold" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
                Awesome teaching support from TAs who did the bootcamp themselves. Getting guidance from them and learning from their experiences was easy.
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ opacity: 0.7 }}>
                " The staff seem genuinely concerned about my progress which I find really refreshing. The program gave me the confidence necessary to be able to go out in the world and present myself as a capable junior developer. The standard is above the rest. You will get the personal attention you need from an incredible community of smart and amazing people. "
              </Typography>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Grid>

        {/* Bottom row */}
        <Grid item xs={12}>
          <Card sx={{ 
            bgcolor: 'white', 
            color: 'black', 
            borderRadius: 3
          }}>
            <CardContent sx={{ p: 4 }}>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', mb: 2 }}>
                <Avatar sx={{ mr: 2 }} src="/api/placeholder/40/40" alt="Kira Whittle" />
                <Box>
                  <Typography variant="subtitle1" fontWeight="bold">
                    Kira Whittle
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="body2">Verified Graduate</Typography>
                </Box>
              </Box>
              <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight="bold" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
                Such a life-changing experience. Highly recommended!
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                " Before joining the bootcamp, I've never written a line of code. I needed some structure from professionals who can help me learn programming step by step. I was encouraged to enroll by a former student of theirs who can only say wonderful things about the program. The entire curriculum and staff did not disappoint. They were very hands-on and I never had to wait long for assistance. The agile team project, in particular, was outstanding. It took my learning to the next level in a way that no tutorial could ever have. In fact, I've often referred to it during interviews as an example of my development experience. It certainly helped me land a job as a full-stack developer after receiving multiple offers. 100% recommend! "
              </Typography>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Grid>
      </Grid>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default TestimonialGrid;
